item.title: Hurricane ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 27
item.description:
Issued at 2100Z FRI SEP 12 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER  27
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
2100Z FRI SEP 12 2003
 
HURRICANE CENTER LOCATED NEAR 21.8N  58.6W AT 12/2100Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  15 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST OR 270 DEGREES AT   8 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  920 MB
EYE DIAMETER  30 NM
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS 140 KT WITH GUSTS TO 170 KT.
64 KT....... 75NE  50SE  50SW  50NW.
50 KT.......100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT.......160NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
12 FT SEAS..325NE 325SE 250SW 300NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 21.8N  58.6W AT 12/2100Z
AT 12/1800Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 21.7N  58.2W
 
FORECAST VALID 13/0600Z 21.9N  59.9W
MAX WIND 140 KT...GUSTS 170 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  50SE  50SW  50NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...160NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 13/1800Z 22.4N  62.1W
MAX WIND 135 KT...GUSTS 165 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  50SE  50SW  50NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...160NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 14/0600Z 23.0N  64.3W
MAX WIND 135 KT...GUSTS 165 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  50SE  50SW  50NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...160NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 14/1800Z 23.6N  66.3W
MAX WIND 130 KT...GUSTS 160 KT.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...160NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 15/1800Z 24.5N  69.5W
MAX WIND 125 KT...GUSTS 155 KT.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...160NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 16/1800Z 26.0N  72.0W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 17/1800Z 28.5N  75.0W
MAX WIND 105 KT...GUSTS 130 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 21.8N  58.6W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 13/0300Z
 
FORECASTER BEVEN
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
